4. City Council

City Council
============

![25/26 City Council](https://www.cityofjustin.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2142 "25/26 City Council")

The Justin City Council is composed of a mayor and six council members.

Meetings
--------

* Second and fourth Thursday of each month
* City Hall - City Council Chambers  
  415 N College Avenue  
  Justin, TX 76247

Council Members
---------------

* Mayor – James Clark (Term expires, May 2026)
* Place 1 – Ryan Stevens (Term expires, May 2027)
* Place 2 – Tomas Mendoza (Term expires, May 2027)
* Place 3 – Steven Teschke (Term expires, May 2027)
* Place 4  - James Castle (Term expires, May 2026)
* Place 5 – Daniel Dennis (Term expires, May 2026)
* Place 6 – Shelby St. Claire (Term expires, May 2026)

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are posted 72 hours prior to the meeting. Minutes are posted after City Council approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](http://129/Agendas-Minutes)

### Attending Meetings

Citizens are welcome to attend the open meeting, which generally begins at 6 p.m.

Rules for Public Comments
-------------------------

* [Public Comments Sign-Up Form](https://tx-justin.civicplus.com/FormCenter/Boards-Commissions-6/Public-Comment-Form-51): Form will be directly submitted to the City Secretary. The online form must be submitted by 4 p.m. prior to the start of the meeting. You may also complete a paper form if attending in person. All forms should be submitted to the City Secretary, prior to the start of the meeting.

Mayor Information
-----------------

The Mayor or a City Council member is available to meet with clubs, civic groups, homeowner associations, nonprofit organizations, school students and scout troops. For scheduling and information, call 940-648-2541
